game.name: Garden of Witches
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: ‘마녀의 정원’은 아기자기하고 위험 넘치는 로그라이크 액션 게임입니다. 제멋대로인 마녀들 때문에 갖은 고생을 하는 주인공 ‘실’을 도와 ‘정원’을 구해주세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Garden of Witches is a cute roguelike action game full of danger. Help the protagonist, Sil, as she tries to round up her unruly fellow witches and save the Garden.

reviewHighlights.text: Garden of Witches is an Action Roguelite with a decent number of active spells and passive skills that like to play off each other and once you unders...
Always enjoyed this dev's games on mobile, seeing this game and seeing the quality still remains is the thing that makes me smile
